trans-unit.source: Specifies the apartment state of a <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 apartment 狀態<xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An apartment is a logical container within a process for objects sharing the same thread access requirements.
trans-unit.target: Apartment 是物件共用相同的執行緒存取需求的程序中的邏輯容器。

trans-unit.source: All objects in the same apartment can receive calls from any thread in the apartment.
trans-unit.target: 相同的 apartment 中的所有物件都可以都接收來自 apartment 中的任何執行緒的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not use apartments, and managed objects are responsible for using all shared resources in a thread-safe manner themselves.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 不會使用的 apartment 和受管理的物件負責使用所有共用的資源以執行緒安全的方式本身。

trans-unit.source: Because COM classes use apartments, the common language runtime needs to create and initialize an apartment when calling a COM object in a COM interop situation.
trans-unit.target: 由於 COM 類別使用 apartment，common language runtime 會需要建立和初始化 apartment，在 COM interop 的情況下呼叫 COM 物件時。

trans-unit.source: A managed thread can create and enter a single-threaded apartment (STA) that allows only one thread, or a multithreaded apartment (MTA) that contains one or more threads.
trans-unit.target: Managed 的執行緒可以建立，然後輸入單一執行緒 apartment (STA)，只允許一個執行緒或包含一或多個執行緒的多執行緒的 apartment (MTA)。

trans-unit.source: You can control the type of apartment created by setting the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ApartmentState%2A> property of the thread to one of the values of the ApartmentState enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制 apartment 藉由將建立的型別<xref:System.Threading.Thread.ApartmentState%2A>之執行緒的 ApartmentState 列舉值的其中一個屬性。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.ApartmentState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because a given thread can only initialize a COM apartment once, you cannot change the apartment type after the first call to the unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 給定的執行緒並一次只能初始化 COM apartment，因為您無法變更 apartment 類型在 unmanaged 程式碼的第一個呼叫之後。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Threading.Thread>, [Managed and Unmanaged Threading](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/db425c20-4b2f-4433-bf96-76071c7881e5), and [Advanced COM Interoperability](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3ada36e5-2390-4d70-b490-6ad8de92f2fb).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Threading.Thread>， [Managed 與 Unmanaged 執行緒處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/db425c20-4b2f-4433-bf96-76071c7881e5)，和[進階 COM 互通性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3ada36e5-2390-4d70-b490-6ad8de92f2fb)。</xref:System.Threading.Thread>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> will create and enter a multithreaded apartment.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref>將會建立並輸入多執行緒的 apartment。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> will create and enter a single-threaded apartment.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref>將會建立並輸入單一執行緒的 apartment。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ApartmentState*> property has not been set.
